brief: This is a White Noise Generator.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Change the amplitude/volume of this sound.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Move the sound in a stereo panorama.

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Set the amplitude and panoramic position with one method.

methods.name: stop()
methods.desc: Stop the noise from playing back

description: This is a White Noise Generator. White Noise has a flat spectrum.
name: WhiteNoise
